about: The Official Facebook page of Sachin Tendulkar.
name: Sachin Tendulkar

posts.message: Preventive measures can go a long way in overcoming and fighting breast cancer… Please encourage your near and dear ones to get tested.
वाढदिवसाच्या शुभेच्छा  #ashabhosle ji. Thanks for all your love and blessings!
All geared up for this season... Are you? #YellowMeinKhelo with Kerala Blasters
And then there were three 😉#JontyRhodes Yuvraj Singh
Lovely to have the father of baby girl 'India' seeking blessings of the Lord! Always fun meeting #JontyRhodes
Guess who dropped by to seek Bappa's blessings today!!?? #GaneshChaturthi
There will never be enough words to thank him for what he has given me. #HappyTeachersDay to my mentor & guide🙏🏻
Happy #GaneshChaturthi to you and your family. Stay blessed 😊
Keep your eyes on the ball, said the little champion!
Jhakaaaasssss!!!!!!!!! Anil S Kapoor
Remembering #DhyanChand Ji and his contributions this #NationalSportsDay. Let's ensure sports becomes an integral part of everyone's life.
In the company of champs who proved their mettle P V Sindhu Sakshi Malik Dipa Karmakar & super coach #PullelaGopichand

Happy to be part of the launch of the impressive #AsterCMI Hospital at Bengaluru. Thank you Dr. Azad Moopen and Aster DM Healthcare for extending our joint initiative to offer support for struggling patients at #AsterCMI. Eligible patients facing financial constraints in undergoing oncology surgery or pediatric cardiology surgery can now seek specific support from Aster CMI Hospital ASTER Medcity Aster MIMS as part of this initiative.
15 years since he has left us but he still remains in our hearts! Happy birthday Sir Don #DonBradman!

"Spent a fruitful morning with Champion Collectors of Swachh Bharat Mission, India. Insightful to hear their experience and enthused by the commitment Team Swachh Bharat. Together, we can make #SwaachBharat a reality."
Wishing everyone a very #HappyJanmashtami and request everyone to be careful and safe
#ServeOurSeniors and spread smiles. It's beautiful! #SOS
A bright & fun filled Sunday morning with Mumbaikars. Special thanks to the group running for Apnalaya India & supporting a great cause!
Right here catching up with the winners of the IDBI Federal Life Insurance Mumbai Half Marathon. It was exciting for me but these guys did all the hardwork!
#ServeOurSeniors to know what true love means. They brighten our lives with so many beautiful things :)
Well played India's youngest individual Olympic medal winner P V Sindhu You have won our hearts with the splendid performance. #Rio2016
From staying up all night to giving the healing touch, they've done a lot. It's high time we #ServeOurSeniors #SOS
Blessed to have her by my side through thick and thin. Thank you tai for everything. #HappyRakshabandhan
Our seniors have done a lot for us. As kids & young adults, we threw tantrums and they obliged. Let's love, respect and #ServeOurSeniors #SOS
Livpure hits another six with their latest 8- stage RO water purifier, Knight, that lets you dispense hot & cold water.
May each day of the coming year be vibrant & bring along many reasons for celebrations. #NavrozMubarak
Wonderful initiative by Thane police, administration and citizens for Elderly care  #mykartavyathane

I've painted myself in marathon colours! Have you done the same yet? Get into the marathon spirit and apply the IDBI Federal Life Insurance Mumbai Half Marathon image filter to your profile here: http://bit.ly/movemumbai2016
Happy #70thIndependenceDay.. Please remember to take care of those who are dependent on us.. Culture of Care for the Elderly
Congrats #DipaKarmakar - the 1st Indian female gymnast in an Olympic finals. Your journey from Agartala to #Rio2016 is inspiring.
I've always been 'bowled' over by all your 'smashing' performances. Happy Birthday Champ and wishing you a speedy recovery Roger Federer
On Friendship Day, I fondly remember all my friends and wish one of my friend's daughter Diya a very happy birthday!
It was an absolute pleasure meeting Mr Bainimarama, the Prime Minister of Fiji at #Rio2016
Wonderful spending time with Mr Thomas Bach, IOC president at #Rio2016 Olympic
All geared up to cheer #PrarthanaThombare & Sania Mirza for the start of their #Rio2016 journey! All the best!!
Different stories. Different experiences. One common thing- passion! Best wishes to all #Indian athletes at #Rio2016

I thank each and everyone who joined me in supporting our heroes. Chalo #Rio mein Tiranga Lehraein www.supportourheroes.co.in
#SupportOurHeroes.
Any guesses for where I am? The #Olympics2016 buzz has made this place even more lively and beautiful!
Enjoying a sunny day with my favourite Nariyal Pani ! #refreshing #MumbaiToRio #memories
It was very insightful meeting members of the Olympic committee at the President's dinner in #Rio2016 #IOC

We all are busy and holidays bring us together. This holiday will bring a lot more together, Your favourite Stars, best of Cuisine & unlimited entertainment. Get ready for World's first cricket and bollywood cruise which promises to bring you memories for life. Come embark, and treated like a King, like a Monarch. Monarch Cruise
Wondering what's the buzz around Digibank by DBS?  Check out this video to know how to #LiveMoreBankLess"

Join me in supporting the athletes, representing our country at #Rio2016. Chalo Rio mein Tiranga Lehraein! www.supportourheroes.co.in
#SupportOurHeroes
Come relive my journey #sachinsaga! Excited about my first official digital game on #Playlzzon! Presenting the "Sachin Saga" Trailer!

Sports teaches you to push your own boundaries and challenge yourself to be better at every step! Training and keeping fit are vital to prepare yourself to run a marathon. But, your determination and grit is what will take you past that finish line. Now is the time to #MoveMumbai! Know more about the IDBI Federal Life Insurance Mumbai Half Marathon here: http://bit.ly/MumbaiHM2016

Countdown has begun!  5 days for the Olympics. Let's #SupportOurHeroes-
www.supportourheroes.co.in
The tiger is our national pride, let's all come together to #saveourtigers from becoming extinct. #internationaltigerday

To become a world class athlete, it takes a lot of determination, struggle and perseverance every day.  
Our athletes have worked really hard to reach such great heights.  चलो, मिलके उन्हें सपोर्ट करे. हम सबका साथ रहेगा तो उनका होंसला बढेगा! Join #SupportOurHeroes www.supportourheroes.co.in
My tphone has arrived to give the seamless tronx experience with the tbook. A big step in #Smartron journey. Best Wishes for the tphone launch! #MadeInIndia #tphonesaleday
Mohammed Shahid, a legend leaves us. Watching his magic with the hockey stick was memorable. May his soul rest in peace.
Deeply shaken by the tragic news of #Nice. Heartfelt condolences to the bereaved families.

Chala, Pude Chala! Come, live a day in Mumbai's shoes! Watch the people that keep #AamchiMumbai moving and get inspired to run the IDBI Federal Life Insurance Mumbai Half Marathon. 
Register here: http://bit.ly/MumbaiHM2016  #MoveMumbai

"Kaafi hard work kar raha hu ki apne desh to iss baar Rio mein gold medal dilwaun" 
Bharat ki shaan hai ye, lets all support #NarsinghYadav on his #RoadtoRio #AgainstAllOdds Indian Olympic Association

"In 2013 I won my first world cup medal, that bronze medal motivated me & gave me confidence that I am capable of winning gold".
A huge shout out to #PrakashNanjappa on his #RoadtoRio.  Jee jaan laga dena! #AgainstAllOdds Indian Olympic Association
Joined Spartan Sports. A line up of Chris Gayle MS Dhoni Eoin Morgan Michael Clarke Mitchell Johnson Wow! Would you want to take on this team? 😜

" Sportsman ke liye sabse best feeling hoti hai ki humein medal mil raha hai aur hum India ka jhanda upar kar rahe hai". 
Bharat ki shaan hai ye, lets all support #SakshiMallik on her #RoadtoRio  #AgainstAllOdds  Indian Olympic Association
Well done Capt. Radhika Menon, first woman recipient of Exceptional Bravery at Sea, International Maritime Organisation for saving fishermen lives!! #RadhikaMenon

"Its one chance & you have to do what you've got with this.."
 Bharat ki shaan hai ye, lets all support #AyonikaPaul on her #RoadToRio #AgainstAllOdds Indian Olympic Association
Eid Mubarak!!
Some injuries trouble even after retirement, but I will be back very soon doing the things I enjoy. Had a knee operation & resting.

"Andar se feel hona chahiye ki kuch karna hai. Jab apna best dene ki sochta hoon, toh mein ye soch ke jaata hoon ki yeh mera last bout hai". 
A huge shout out to #RavindarKhatri on his #RoadtoRio.  
Jee jaan laga dena! #AgainstAllOdds Indian Olympic Association
Happy birthday Bhajji! May God bless you with good health and happiness. Have a great year buddy! Harbhajan Singh

"Ring mein ghusne ke baad darr nahi lagta, phir toh apna kaam karna hai chahe haru ya jeetun". 
Bharat ki shaan hai ye, lets all support #HardeepSingh on his #RoadtoRio  #AgainstAllOdds Indian Olympic Association
The solitude and remote stretches in Scotland
Enjoyed the Castles in Scotland
What an exciting day it was when I introduced True Blue to the world. Happy to be part of a truly global fashion brand with an Indian soul. Visit www.trueblue.nnnow.com to check out the collection.

During my drive on the island inlet of water appeared to look like the map of India.
Saare jahan se achcha Hindustan hamara!!!
'Fishing' around with the camera and it's angle ;)

Are you ready to challenge yourself to take you past that finish line? Participate in the IDBI Federal Life Insurance Mumbai Half Marathon? Are you ready to #MoveMumbai?
Register for the Marathon here: http://bit.ly/MumbaiHM2016!

"It is the biggest experience ever for any athlete to represent their nation at Olympics". 
A huge shout out to Shiva Thapa on his #RoadtoRio.  Jee jaan laga dena! #AgainstAllOdds Indian Olympic Association
Huge portion of delicious fish n chips! Anyone wanna share with me?? 😋

It was fun filming these videos for Digibank by DBS - Go mobile–only and avoid branch visits or paperwork. Earn 7% interest while you relax at home. 
Check it out bit.ly/28JWL8i

"Papa ne sapna dekha tha ki meri betiyon ko wrestler banaunga …. humne  papa ka sapna sach kar dikhaya  hai". 
A huge shout out to Babita Phogat on her #RoadtoRio.  Jee jaan laga dena! #AgainstAllOdds Indian Olympic Association
For all those who didn't manage to guess, the clue is in this photograph! :)
Guess where I am???? :)
These are the moments which make it all worthwhile .... Unexpected loving gift from the greatest gifts of my life .... Left me speechless on #FathersDay #ProudFather
The person I always looked upto and wanted to be like. #HappyFathersDay

"Bahot Khushi hoti hai ke kisi pehli Indian women ne gymnast mein qualify kiya".
 Bharat ki shaan hai ye, lets all support #DipaKarmakar on her #RoadtoRio  #AgainstAllOdds  Indian Olympic Association
Who says sky is the limit.... That's where the journey begins! Congratulations #AvaniChaturvedi #MohanaSingh #BhawanaKanth on being the first women fighters in #IndianAirForce.

"Sister ko dekhkar hi mein TT mein aayi. Mein chahti hu ki log mujhe pehchane, I want to be a legend." 
A huge shout out to #ManikaBatra on her #RoadtoRio. Jee jaan laga dena! #AgainstAllOdds  Indian Olympic Association

"Wrestling ek power ka game hai, aur sirf ladkon mein power hoti hai aisa nahi hai. Ladkiyon mein bhi bahut zyada power hoti hai." 
Bharat ki shaan hai ye, lets all support Vinesh Phogat on her #RoadtoRio  #AgainstAllOdds Indian Olympic Association
"A day without laughter is a day wasted".  A person who has never failed to tickle our funny bones. An actor, comedian and director par excellence!! #CharlieChaplin
A walk in the Park!!
Back of the Head Fan moment!!
Strong skills guys! When are we going to play cricket at night together Audemars Piguet

A marathon isn't just about running, it's a lifestyle change. Are you ready to commit to a healthier tomorrow? Take your first step towards a fitter lifestyle and register for the IDBI Federal Life Insurance Mumbai Half Marathon here: http://bit.ly/MumbaiHM2016
Now is the time to #Movemumbai.
My hero since childhood. I always had a wish to meet you some day but now it will never happen. RIP "The Greatest" #MuhammadAli

Kerala Blasters celebratory symbol! #yellowmeinkhelo
Excited about the new season of Kerala Blasters.Looking forward to the continued support #yellowmeinkhelo
The #YellowMeinKhelo selfie with new co-owners. A warm welcome to the football crazy world of Kerala Blasters

The wait is over. The day you have been looking forward to is here.
It is time to #BeTrueBlue.
To know more, visit www.trueblue.nnnow.com

Met some of our champion athletes preparing for #RioOlympics2016.

Their dedication and spirit is inspiring.  Best wishes as they chase their dream of a podium finish.
Look forward to the opening of the 200th Aster Pharmacy store in Dubai.
My favourite writing companion has a new identity! Watch to know more  https://youtu.be/fpqSscGiqMc Rorito
Going down this nostalgic trip, I realized everything that makes you live is good. #LiveMoreBankLess with Digibank by DBS http://go.dbs.com/1WuqYi6
Always showered me with love and blessings. Thanks for being there for me. #HappyMothersDay

India has given me everything and has always been a source of inspiration in everything I do. I'm thrilled to announce that I've something special lined up. It is True Blue.  #BeTrueBlue http://www.trueblue.nnnow.com/
Have found a new way to #LiveMoreBankLess. Thank you #Digor and Digibank by DBS
I couldn't have imagined a better start to my birthday than being in the company of these spirited children. There is so much to learn on fighting back from them. Thank you Make-A-Wish India
